name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_gender_acc
description: Accuracy of the message author gender.

name: channel_created
description: Date when the channel was created.

name: channel_delete_at
description: Date when the channel was deleted.

name: channel_update_at
description: Date when the channel was updated.

name: demography_max_date
description: Date of the latest message of the corresponding author. Available only when demography study is active.

name: demography_min_date
description: Date of the first (oldest) message of the corresponding author. Available only when demography study is active.

name: files.file_create_at
description: Date when the file was created.

name: files.file_update_at
description: Date when the file was updated.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Date when the message was updated.

name: is_mattermost_message
description: Field containing '1' that allows to sum fields when concatenating with other indexes.

name: is_pinned
description: 1 if the message is pinned or 0 in other case.

name: is_reply
description: 1 if the message is a reply or 0 in other case.

name: message_analyzed
description: Content message split by terms to allow searching.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the repository was retrieved from.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy).

name: reactions.reaction_create_at
description:
Date when the reaction was created.
reactions.reaction_emoji_name,keyword,true,Name of the emoji."

name: reactions.reaction_update_at
description: Date when the reaction was updated.

name: tz
description: Timezone in which the message was made by its original author.

name: user_data_bot
description: True if the given user is identified as a bot.

name: user_data_domain
description: Domain associated to the user in SortingHat profile.
